data.message: Here’s a thought jackass. No one with IQ about single digits cares what you think on any topic much less President Trump.

replies.message: Amen
So why did you comment? You must care!!!

"No one with IQ about single digits."

You sure did get him good, Bill.
Another Dump supporter with their panties in a bunch.
Excellent
Haha Jake Draper you the man.
You don't care but take time to post a comment.. 😂😂😂
Look up the word irony.

Will the real slim shady please shut up! You missed the class on class you're a pain in the ass, but what can be expected from this trailer trash! You open up your mouth and your brain drops out like a broken PEZ dispenser when the spring pops out. Think talking crap about  our POTUS will get you real far, well your mom thought the same that drunk night in the bar! Climbing up the stairs with a beer in her hand thinking "gonna make a daddy outta this ol'man", 9 months later a little boy popped out with his junk in his hand and a permanent pout. You were pissed at the world before you could even walk, like then, right now, you should learn to really talk. Mister lyrical flow, we don't wanna know, how you feel 'bout the Prez cuz it's all a big show!  Politically corrected, spanked on your behind, Marshall close your mouth man, you've done lost your mind!
Here's a thought jackass. No one with with IQ about single digits cares what you think on any topic much less Rap God.
Ok fake ass fan. If you were a real fan you'd know he's been talking politics for years now, and you're just now getting butt hurt there snowflake? Move along.
And heres another fucking troll dissing a Legand for simply giving his opinion about a shitty politician. Thats all you'll be remembered for. Quite talking shit.
Has Eminem ever really cared what people think of him though? 🤔
Then why are you still following his page. He dgaf about Chump supporters. ✌ #Facktrump ✊
Ewwww AngieAlvis if your bf is a rapper and he wrote that tell him to retire

Then the man told you to go fuck yourself, rather than keep a fan like you. 

Too dense for that huh? Go. Away. Even HE wants you to go away
Yet here you are commenting dip shit!
Stupid move, good musician but a poor businessman, you don't shit on at minimum 25% of you fan base because of politics... Fucking moron
Actually, people with high IQs like to listen to him because of what he can do with words. Only low IQ people such as yourself take his music to heart. Don't melt snowflake.
I guess y'all forgot about encore... And all the Busch songs that gave him even more fame.
Big opinion coming from a guy hiding behind a screen...hiding his profile pic..... im an educated professional with a few degrees......and I loved every second of it......
